problem_text:
Let M be a subgroup of a finite group G, A an abelian 2-subgroup of M, and suppose that Ag is not contained in M for some g from G. Determine the structure of G under the hypothesis that ⟨A, Ax⟩ = G whenever the subgroup Ax, x ∈ G, is not contained in M.
A. A. Makhn¨ev
answer: It is described mod CFSG (V. I. Zenkov, Algebra and Logic, 35, no. 3 (1996), 160–163).
